verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
C
Spirit of the living God
Fall afresh on me
Spirit of the living God
Fall afresh on me
Make me
Mold me
Fill me
Use me
Spirit of the living God
Fall afresh on me

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Spirit of the living God
Fall afresh on us
Spirit of the living God
Fall afresh on us
Make us
Mold us
Fill us
Use us
Spirit of the living God
Fall afresh on us
